DOC.brief_summary: A randomized double-blind placebo-controlled crossover trial conduct . 200 subject age 20 year body mass index ( BMI ) 25 kg/m2 randomly divide 2 group ( Group 1 Group 2 ) . Group 1 receive laser acupuncture therapy first Group 2 receive sham laser acupuncture therapy first . After 12 week treatment 14 day washout , Group 1 switch sham laser acupuncture therapy Group 2 switch laser acupuncture 12 week . The subject treat gallium aluminum arsenide Handylaser Trion , use apply acupuncture point 10 second every time , 3 time per week . The measurement outcomes perform beginning , weekly treatment , monthly treatment 3 month .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Evaluation Laser Acupuncture Obesity
DOC.criteria: Body Mass Index 25 kg/m2 Waist girth 80cm female , waist girth 90cm male Pathmakers user Epilepsy history Pregnancy Immunoinhibiting agent user Malignancy Skin contact disease Weight control agent user trial period Eating disorder
